page.title: 05ANOTHER COUNTRY HOUSE
page.content: {Lindley Lodge}now known as{King's {Lodge}is situated by the Watling Street near Nuneaton Warwickshire. An old country house surrounded by lawns and trees stands in 13 acres of land.For the past 18 months it has been a{Training School}for the {International Missionary Organisation known as{'Youth with a Mission'. The Mission-a charitable Trust-was founded in 1960 and has bases in 60 Countries.Students of 18 years upwards come from all over the World for short or long term studies of the complete {Bible and Discipleship}training.Some become overseas Missionaries and others aim to work in City churches.By the end of 1985 the Mission hope to own this property.Funds for the Organisation come from support groups around the world.The present Director is Mr Oliver Nyumbu from Zimbabwe.
